name: Legate Officer (Whiterun)
role: Commanding officer of the outer barricade line during the Stormcloak assault

aspects.high_concept: Hard-Bitten Imperial Officer Holding the Line
aspects.trouble: The Orders Don't Account for This Much Chaos
other_aspects: My Men Follow Because I Lead from the Front

stunts: Hold the Line: +2 to Fight when defending a zone against a larger force.
Officer's Rally: Once per scene, remove a mild consequence from an allied Imperial NPC in the same zone.
combat_tactics: Fights at the center of his line, using his men as a shield formation. Will attempt to retreat and regroup if outnumbered beyond 3:1. Can be captured if flanked or if his guards are neutralized.
capture_vs_kill: If captured, provides intel on inner defenses (reduces Stage 2 opposition by 1 for Stormcloak version). If killed, Imperial morale in Stage 2 is reduced but no intel is gained.
scene_triggers: Battle of Whiterun Stage 1 (Stormcloak assault - outer barricades)
